org.typemeta.funcj.control

Interface StateR.Kleisli<S,A,B>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the state type
    A - the input type
    B - the value type of the returned @{code StateR} type
    Enclosing interface:
    StateR<S,A>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface StateR.Kleisli<S,A,B>
    Kleisli models composable operations that return a StateR.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <V> StateR.Kleisli<S,A,V> andThen(StateR.Kleisli<S,B,V> kUV)
      Compose this Kleisli with another by applying this one first, then the other.
      default <C> StateR.Kleisli<S,C,B> compose(StateR.Kleisli<S,C,A> kST)
      Compose this Kleisli with another by applying the other one first, and then this one.
      static <S,T,U> StateR.Kleisli<S,T,U> of(Functions.F<T,StateR<S,U>> f)
      Construct a Kleisli value from a function.
      StateR<S,B> run(A a)
      Run this Kleisli operation

        f - the function

        the new Kleisli

        StateR<S,B> run(A a)
        Run this Kleisli operation
        Parameters:
        a - the input value
        Returns:

      • andThen

        default <V> StateR.Kleisli<S,A,V> andThen(StateR.Kleisli<S,B,V> kUV)
        Compose this Kleisli with another by applying this one first, then the other.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the second Kleisli's return type
        Parameters:
        kUV - the Kleisli to be applied after this one
        Returns:
        the composed Kleisli

      • compose

        default <C> StateR.Kleisli<S,C,B> compose(StateR.Kleisli<S,C,A> kST)
        Compose this Kleisli with another by applying the other one first, and then this one.
        Type Parameters:
        C - the first Kleisli's input type
        Parameters:
        kST - the Kleisli to be applied after this one
        Returns:
        the composed Kleisli
